game.title: A New Hope
game.synopsis: The story of a young hero's journey to save the galaxy from the evil Empire.
game.beginning: On the desert planet of Tatooine, a young farm boy named Luke Skywalker discovers a message hidden inside a droid that sets him on an adventure.
game.ending: Luke and his allies defeat the Empire's superweapon, the Death Star, and restore hope to the galaxy.
